rage_powder.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.
rage_powder.name: Rage Powder

rain_dance.description: Create Rain in a 60 ft area within 60 ft. While active, Fire-type moves deal -1 DD damage, and Water-type moves deal +1 DD damage. Focus may be maintained to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
rain_dance.name: Rain Dance

rapid_spin.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target gains 1 Speed.
rapid_spin.name: Rapid Spin

recycle.description: The user recycles a single-use item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.
recycle.name: Recycle

reflect.description: Increase the Defense of all allies within 30 ft. by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
reflect.name: Reflect

reflect_type.description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.
reflect_type.name: Reflect Type

refresh.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.
refresh.name: Refresh

rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user’s HP and heals any status problem.
rest.name: Rest

retaliate.description: Crits if a teammate fainted on the last turn.
retaliate.name: Retaliate

return.description: deals more damage the more the pokemon like its trainer
return.name: Return

revenge.description: +1 DD if user was attacked. (Extra damage only applies to targets that did damage to user)
revenge.name: Revenge

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.notes: Use the user’s current HP percentage to determine damage: above 50% HP deal 3 DD; 25–50% HP deal 4 DD; below 25% HP deal 5 DD. *review

rising_voltage.description: This move does +1 DD in Electric Terrain
rising_voltage.name: Rising Voltage

roar.description: Lets out a terrifying roar that forces the target backward.
roar.name: Roar
roar.notes: On hit, the target is pushed 15 ft directly away from the user. If the target’s Trainer is within 15 ft of the target, the Trainer must immediately perform a forced Pokémon swap, following normal switching rules.

rock_climb.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Confusion.
rock_climb.name: Rock Climb

rock_polish.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It sharply raises the Speed stat.
rock_polish.name: Rock Polish

role_play.description: The user mimics the foe completely, copying the foe’s natural ability.
role_play.name: Role Play

roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
roost.name: Roost

rototiller.description: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of any Grass-type Pokémon on the field by one stage each.
rototiller.name: Rototiller

round.name: Round
round.notes: If an ally Pokémon has already used Round this round, add +1 damage die to this attack, stacking up to a maximum of +3 damage dice total for the round.

sacred_fire.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burn.
sacred_fire.name: Sacred Fire

safeguard.description: Allies within 15 ft. are protected from new status conditions for 1 + 1d4 turns. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.notes: Prevents new status conditions only; existing statuses are unaffected.

sandstorm.description: Whip up a Sandstorm in a 60 ft area within 60 ft. While active, creatures in the area take 1 DD chip damage at the end of their turn (Rock, Ground, and Steel are unaffected).
sandstorm.name: Sandstorm

scald.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burn.
scald.name: Scald

screech.description: Lets out a piercing screech that sharply lowers the target’s Defense by 2 until the end of its next turn.
screech.name: Screech

searing_shot.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Burn.
searing_shot.name: Searing Shot

secret_power.description: Deals damage and its secondary effect depends on the environment
secret_power.name: Secret Power

seed_flare.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target loses 1 Sp. Def.
seed_flare.name: Seed Flare

self_destruct.name: Self-Destruct
self_destruct.notes: User is knocked out after resolving the move.

sharpen.description: The user reduces its polygon count to make itself more jagged, raising the Attack stat.
sharpen.name: Sharpen

shed_tail.description: Creates a substitute, then swaps places with a party Pokémon
shed_tail.name: Shed Tail

shell_smash.description: Increase your Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by 2, but reduce your DEF and Special DEF by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
shell_smash.name: Shell Smash

shell_trap.description: Shell Trap sets a trap at the beginning of the turn, and if the user is hit by a physical move during the turn, it deals high damage to the opponent.
shell_trap.name: Shell Trap

shift_gear.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack and sharply raising its Speed.
shift_gear.name: Shift Gear

shore_up.description: The user regains 2 HD HP. It restores more 1 extra HD HP in a sandstorm.
shore_up.name: Shore Up

silver_wind.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, The user gains +1 to all stats.
silver_wind.name: Silver Wind

simple_beam.description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.
simple_beam.name: Simple Beam

sing.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target falls Asleep.
sing.name: Sing

sketch.description: It enables the user to learn a move used by the foe. Once used, the move Sketch disappears.
sketch.name: Sketch

skill_swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange abilities with the foe.
skill_swap.name: Skill Swap

skitter_smack.description: This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.
skitter_smack.name: Skitter Smack

sky_attack.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Flinch.
sky_attack.name: Sky Attack

sky_drop.description: Sky Drop takes the target into the air on the first turn, then drops them on the second turn, wherein they receive damage.
sky_drop.name: Sky Drop

slack_off.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP.
slack_off.name: Slack Off

slash.description: This move has an increased critical hit chance (19-20).
slash.name: Slash

sleep_powder.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target falls Asleep.
sleep_powder.name: Sleep Powder

sleep_talk.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.
sleep_talk.name: Sleep Talk

sludge.description: On a 8-10 on the Condition Die, the target is Poison.
sludge.name: Sludge

sludge_bomb.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Poison.
sludge_bomb.name: Sludge Bomb

sludge_wave.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is Poison.
sludge_wave.name: Sludge Wave

smack_down.name: Smack Down
smack_down.notes: A grounded target loses Flying-based movement benefits and is treated as grounded for move interactions.

smelling_salts.description: Crits if the target is paralyzed. However, it also cures the paralysis.
smelling_salts.name: Smelling Salts

smokescreen.description: Reduce all enemies’ Accuracy by 1 while within the smokescreen. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
smokescreen.name: Smokescreen

snarl.description: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
snarl.name: Snarl

snatch.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or status-changing move the foe attempts to use.
snatch.name: Snatch

snore.description: Can only be used while the user is asleep
snore.name: Snore

snowscape.description: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.
snowscape.name: Snowscape

soak.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.
soak.name: Soak

soft_boiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its maximum HP. It may also be used to heal an ally’s HP.
soft_boiled.name: Soft-Boiled

spark.description: On a 8-10 on the Condition Die, the target is Paralyzed.
spark.name: Spark

sparkling_aria.description: Deals {damage} Electric damage to one enemy within 60 ft.
sparkling_aria.name: Sparkling Aria

spider_web.description: The user ensnares the foe with a thin, gooey silk so it can’t flee from battle.
spider_web.name: Spider Web

spikes.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the foe’s feet. The trap hurts foes that step into that area
spikes.name: Spikes

spiky_shield.description: Blocks incoming attacks until your next turn. Deals damage to anyone that attacks users while shield is active (2 DD)
spiky_shield.name: Spiky Shield

spite.description: On a successful hit, the user curses the target with spiteful energy. Choose one: the target loses its Pokémon Action, Trainer Action, or Reaction for the duration.
spite.name: Spite
spite.notes: The user chooses which action type is disabled on hit. This effect may be Focused to extend duration (must be declared before the d4 is rolled).

splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
splash.name: Splash

spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.
spore.name: Spore

stealth_rock.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the foe. The trap hurts foes that switch into battle.
stealth_rock.name: Stealth Rock

steamroller.description: If the target has used Minimize, Steamroller ignores accuracy and deals double damage.
steamroller.name: Steamroller

steel_wing.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the user gains 1 Defense.
steel_wing.name: Steel Wing

sticky_web.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target loses 1 Speed.
sticky_web.name: Sticky Web

stockpile.description: The user charges up power, and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def. The move can be used three times.
stockpile.name: Stockpile

stomp.description: If the target has used Minimize, Stomp ignores accuracy and crits.
stomp.name: Stomp

stomping_tantrum.description: If the user's previous move has failed, add 1 DD
stomping_tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum

strength_sap.description: Deals {damage} Grass damage to one enemy within 15 ft.
strength_sap.name: Strength Sap

struggle.description: Recoil: the user also takes 2 DD damage.
struggle.name: Struggle

stuff_cheeks.description: The user eats its held Berry, then sharply raises its Defense stat.
stuff_cheeks.name: Stuff Cheeks

stun_spore.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may paralyze the target.
stun_spore.name: Stun Spore

substitute.description: Create a substitute that blocks the first attack that would hit you. The substitute has HP equal to 25% of your max HP. If the substitute's HP drops to 0, it is destroyed.
substitute.name: Substitute

sunny_day.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.
sunny_day.name: Sunny Day

supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.
supersonic.name: Supersonic

swagger.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Increase the target's Attack by 1. On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target becomes Confused. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
swagger.name: Swagger

swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP.
swallow.name: Swallow

sweet_kiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness, causing it to become Confused for 1 + 1d4 turns.
sweet_kiss.name: Sweet Kiss

switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the foe faster than the eye can follow.
switcheroo.name: Switcheroo

swords_dance.description: The user performs an intense battle dance, gaining +2 Attack until the end of its next turn.
swords_dance.name: Swords Dance
swords_dance.notes: Pokemon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

synthesis.description: Regain HP equal to 2 Healing Dice. If Sunny weather is active, regain 3 Healing Dice instead. If Rain, Sandstorm, or Hail is active, regain 1 Healing Die instead.
synthesis.name: Synthesis

tail_glow.description: Drastically raises user's Special Attack. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
tail_glow.name: Tail Glow

tail_whip.description: The user wags its tail, lowering the Defense of nearby enemies.
tail_whip.name: Tail Whip

take_heart.description: Cures the user's status conditions and raises Sp. Atk and Sp. Def.
take_heart.name: Take Heart

tar_shot.description: Lowers the target's Speed and causes Fire damage against it to be super effective.
tar_shot.name: Tar Shot

taunt.description: Opponent can only use moves that attack. Requires Focus.
taunt.name: Taunt

tea_time.description: Forces all creatures to immediately consume their held Berries.
tea_time.name: Tea Time

tearful_look.description: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1 for 1 + 1d4 turns.
tearful_look.name: Tearful Look

telekinesis.description: Telekinesis raises the target into the air for three turns, guaranteeing that all attacks against the target (except OHKO moves) will hit, regardless of Accuracy or Evasion
telekinesis.name: Telekinesis

temper_flare.description: If your previous move failed, this move deals +1 DD increased damage.
temper_flare.name: Temper Flare

tera_blast.description: Changes element to match the user's current Tera type. May use physical or special scaling based on the user.
tera_blast.name: Tera Blast

terrain_pulse.description: If a terrain is active, this move changes element to match it and deals increased damage.
terrain_pulse.name: Terrain Pulse

thousand_arrows.description: Can hit airborne targets and grounds them.
thousand_arrows.name: Thousand Arrows

thousand_waves.description: The target is trapped until it is switched out.
thousand_waves.name: Thousand Waves

throat_chop.description: Prevents the target from using sound-based moves for 2 turns.
throat_chop.name: Throat Chop

thunder.description: On a 8-10 on the Condition Die, the target is paralyzed.
thunder.name: Thunder

thunder_cage.description: The target is trapped and takes persistent damage for several turns.
thunder_cage.name: Thunder Cage

thunder_fang.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is paralyzed.
thunder_fang.name: Thunder Fang

thunder_punch.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is paralyzed.
thunder_punch.name: Thunder Punch

thunder_wave.description: Choose one enemy within 30 ft. Roll a Condition Die; on a 10, the target is Paralyzed.
thunder_wave.name: Thunder Wave

thunderbolt.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is paralyzed.
thunderbolt.name: Thunderbolt

tickle.description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Defense. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
tickle.name: Tickle

tidy_up.description: Removes hazards on both sides and raises the user's Attack and Speed.
tidy_up.name: Tidy Up

topsy_turvy.description: Topsy-Turvy reverses the stat changes of the target Pokémon.
topsy_turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy

torment.description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row. Requires Focus
torment.name: Torment

toxic_thread.description: Poisons the target and lowers its Speed by 1 for 1 + 1d4 turns.
toxic_thread.name: Toxic Thread

trailblaze.description: The user's Speed is raised by 1.
trailblaze.name: Trailblaze

transform.description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.
transform.name: Transform

trick.description: Trick switches held items with the target. It does not require both Pokémon to be holding an item, in which case the item is simply given to the target or received from it.
trick.name: Trick

trick_room.description: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.
trick_room.name: Trick Room

trop_kick.description: The target's Attack is lowered by 1 for 1 + 1d4 turns.
trop_kick.name: Trop Kick

trump_card.description: Deals more damage based on how many great slots are remaining.
trump_card.name: Trump Card

upper_hand.description: This move has priority. The target is flinched.
upper_hand.name: Upper Hand

venom_drench.description: The target's sp_atk_atk_spd is lowered by 1 for until switched out.
venom_drench.name: Venom Drench

venoshock.description: This attack does +1 DD if target is poisoned
venoshock.name: Venoshock

vital_throw.description: This attack never misses. If you use this move, your turn during this round will be changed to last in turn order
vital_throw.name: Vital Throw

wake_up_slap.description: This attack does +2 DD if target is asleep, then wakes them up
wake_up_slap.name: Wake-Up Slap

water_pulse.description: On a 9-10 on the Condition Die, the target is confused.
water_pulse.name: Water Pulse

water_shuriken.description: Hits 2-5 times. This move has priority.
water_shuriken.name: Water Shuriken

whirlpool.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is trapped.
whirlpool.name: Whirlpool

whirlwind.description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.
whirlwind.name: Whirlwind

wildbolt_storm.description: On a 9-10 on the Condition Die, the target is paralyzed.
wildbolt_storm.name: Wildbolt Storm

will_o_wisp.description: Engulfs the target in ghostly flames, User may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
will_o_wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp

wish.description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.
wish.name: Wish

withdraw.description: Increase your DEF by 1. Pokémon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).
withdraw.name: Withdraw

work_up.description: The user steels itself, gaining +1 Attack and +1 Special Attack until the end of its next turn.
work_up.name: Work Up
work_up.notes: Pokemon may maintain Focus to extend duration (Must be declared before d4 is rolled).

worry_seed.description: Replace the target’s Ability with Insomnia.
worry_seed.name: Worry Seed

yawn.description: Makes the target Drowsy. If the target remains Drowsy, it falls Asleep at the start of your next turn.
yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.notes: The target becomes drowsy and falls asleep at the start of their next turn unless retreated.

zen_headbutt.description: On a 10 on the Condition Die, the target is flinched.
zen_headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt

zing_zap.description: On a 8-10 on the Condition Die, the target is flinched.
zing_zap.name: Zing Zap
